mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_organization ( PARENT_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_PATH, ORG_SIMPLE_NAME, ORG_FULL_NAME, ORG_ADDRESS1, ORG_ADDRESS2, ORG_TEL1, ORG_TEL2, ORG_REG_DATE, ORG_TYPE, ORG_FAX, ORG_POSTAL, ORG_LEGAL, ORG_TAX_NO, ORG_REG_NO, ORG_BELONG_DIST, WEB_URL, WEICHAT, WEIBLOG, MEMO, ORG_STATE, AVALIABLE, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_MARK ) VALUES ( #{parentId}, #{orgCode}, #{orgPath}, #{orgSimpleName}, #{orgFullName}, #{orgAddress1}, #{orgAddress2}, #{orgTel1}, #{orgTel2}, #{orgRegDate}, #{orgType}, #{orgFax}, #{orgPostal}, #{orgLegal}, #{orgTaxNo}, #{orgRegNo}, #{orgBelongDist}, #{webUrl}, #{weichat}, #{weiblog}, #{memo}, #{orgState}, #{avaliable}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteMark} )
mapper.update: update ts_organization set PARENT_ID=#{parentId}, ORG_CODE=#{orgCode}, ORG_PATH=#{orgPath}, ORG_SIMPLE_NAME=#{orgSimpleName}, ORG_FULL_NAME=#{orgFullName}, ORG_ADDRESS1=#{orgAddress1}, ORG_ADDRESS2=#{orgAddress2}, ORG_TEL1=#{orgTel1}, ORG_TEL2=#{orgTel2}, ORG_REG_DATE=#{orgRegDate}, ORG_TYPE=#{orgType}, ORG_FAX=#{orgFax}, ORG_POSTAL=#{orgPostal}, ORG_LEGAL=#{orgLegal}, ORG_TAX_NO=#{orgTaxNo}, ORG_REG_NO=#{orgRegNo}, ORG_BELONG_DIST=#{orgBelongDist}, WEB_URL=#{webUrl}, WEICHAT=#{weichat}, WEIBLOG=#{weiblog}, MEMO=#{memo}, ORG_STATE=#{orgState}, AVALIABLE=#{avaliable}, update_by = #{updateUser}, update_time=#{updateTime} where ORG_ID=#{orgId}
mapper.sql: SELECT ORG_ID, PARENT_ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_PATH, ORG_SIMPLE_NAME, ORG_FULL_NAME, ORG_ADDRESS1, ORG_ADDRESS2, ORG_TEL1, ORG_TEL2, ORG_REG_DATE, ORG_TYPE, ORG_FAX, ORG_POSTAL, ORG_LEGAL, ORG_TAX_NO, ORG_REG_NO, ORG_BELONG_DIST, WEB_URL, WEICHAT, WEIBLOG, MEMO, ORG_STATE, AVALIABLE, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_MARK FROM ts_organization where delete_mark=0 and parent_id!=0
